subject: Last CFP:: ICCTIM2015:: Apr. 21 - 23, 2015
from: "The Second International Conference on Computing Technology and Information Management (ICCTIM2015)" <donotreply@sdiwc.us>
body:
The Submission has been extended to March 23, 2015             
             
**************************************************************
The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications (SDIWC)would like to invite you attend the following conference: 

The Second International Conference on Computing Technology and Information Management (ICCTIM2015)

              http://sdiwc.net/conferences/icctim2015/
           Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia, Malaysia

                          April 21- 23, 2015

**************************************************************
Important Dates

Submission Deadline: March 23, 2015
Notification of Acceptance: March 05,2015 
Camera Ready Submission: Open from now until April 10, 2015
Registration Deadline: Open from now until April 11, 2015
Conference Dates: April 21-23, 2015


----------------------------------------

If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://sdiwc.us/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=d67fac30874ed23b1c8bf6f96d9f2cb5
